title: Welcome
body: Welcome player, this is Tawa, a tower defense-style game where you have to place towers to defend yourself from enemy attacks.<<finish>>

title: Stars
body: To see your level missions, click the star icon at the bottom left of the screen.<<finish>>

title: Options
body: To open the options menu, click on the gear button located at the bottom left side of the screen.<<finish>>

title: TawasIntro
body: These are your towers, also known as "tawas". They are your only line of defense against your enemies, and each one has special properties.<<finish>>

title: TawasPut
body: To construct a tower, you need to click on the icon of the desired tower and then click on an empty tile on the screen.<<finish>>

title: Enemy
body: Look out here comes a Enemy!<<finish>>

title: End
body: Congratulations! You have completed the tutorial, good luck on the rest of the levels<<finish>>

title: Merge
body: To upgrade a tawa you have to insert a new one and merge it.<<finish>>
